creator: Flash Romeo Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Voilà! sets employee scheduling on autopilot. It’s time for managers to stop wasting time scheduling and managing employee replacements. Empower employees to take the wheel. With Voilà!, managers set their custom scheduling rules and assign work shifts to employees who create optimal schedules that meet everyone’s needs. Let time be on everyone’s side by assigning shifts and replacing workers on cruise-control.

The Employee-centric HR Solution



With Voilà!, employees are in the driver’s seat. They get to create their work schedule based on their managers’ needs for each position. Since employees know their availability best, they can make their schedule by bidding on available shifts, request replacements and swap work shifts with colleagues. Managers set their custom business rules and approve shifts based on their level of flexibility set in place.

👩‍💼👨‍💼 Why Managers Love It ❤️
✓ Define your staffing needs and create the required work shifts.
✓ Stop wasting time by creating recurring work shifts.
✓ Stay in control using advanced metrics and simple employee scheduling dashboards.
✓ Gain precious time back by letting employees fill in work shifts based on their availability.
✓ Prioritize which employees get to pick work shifts first using 100% customizable business rules scores and seniority.
✓ Fill open work shifts faster by alerting employees through email, SMS or push notifications.
✓ Set your custom rules and decide what you need to approve.

👩‍🏭👨‍⚕️👷‍♂️👩‍⚕️ Why Employees Love It ❤️
✓ Create a work schedule that fits your needs and constraints.
✓ View and manage your work shift calendar from anywhere on any device.
✓ Get notified about new work opportunities in the way you want: via email, SMS or push notifications.
✓ Whenever unavailable, request replacements on the go.
✓ Swap work shifts with coworkers.
✓ Request your vacations online for faster approval.
✓ Message coworkers from Voilà! via email, push notifications or SMS.

What makes it work so well?
Voilà! manages which employees are qualified for requested positions and work shifts, invites them to use their manager’s preferred system and then makes sure their total work hours comply with the businesses staff management policy.

Designed by a seasoned team of HR Tech entrepreneurs
Voilà! keeps pushing the boundaries of staff management technologies and empowers managers to stay in control of their business most efficiently.

---

Join Voilà! today and stop struggling with employee scheduling and start growing your business. Contact us! https://voila.app/en/contact-us/ or info@voila.app

title: Voilà! – Manage Work Teams, Schedules & Calendars

container.value:
Flash Romeo Inc.
535-5600 Boulevard des Galeries
Québec G2K 2H6

creator: Flash Romeo Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Voilà! sets employee scheduling on autopilot. It’s time for managers to stop wasting time scheduling and managing employee replacements. Empower employees to take the wheel. With Voilà!, managers set their custom scheduling rules and assign work shifts to employees who create optimal schedules that meet everyone’s needs. Let time be on everyone’s side by assigning shifts and replacing workers on cruise-control.

The Employee-centric HR Solution



With Voilà!, employees are in the driver’s seat. They get to create their work schedule based on their managers’ needs for each position. Since employees know their availability best, they can make their schedule by bidding on available shifts, request replacements and swap work shifts with colleagues. Managers set their custom business rules and approve shifts based on their level of flexibility set in place.

👩‍💼👨‍💼 Why Managers Love It ❤️
✓ Define your staffing needs and create the required work shifts.
✓ Stop wasting time by creating recurring work shifts.
✓ Stay in control using advanced metrics and simple employee scheduling dashboards.
✓ Gain precious time back by letting employees fill in work shifts based on their availability.
✓ Prioritize which employees get to pick work shifts first using 100% customizable business rules scores and seniority.
✓ Fill open work shifts faster by alerting employees through email, SMS or push notifications.
✓ Set your custom rules and decide what you need to approve.

👩‍🏭👨‍⚕️👷‍♂️👩‍⚕️ Why Employees Love It ❤️
✓ Create a work schedule that fits your needs and constraints.
✓ View and manage your work shift calendar from anywhere on any device.
✓ Get notified about new work opportunities in the way you want: via email, SMS or push notifications.
✓ Whenever unavailable, request replacements on the go.
✓ Swap work shifts with coworkers.
✓ Request your vacations online for faster approval.
✓ Message coworkers from Voilà! via email, push notifications or SMS.

What makes it work so well?
Voilà! manages which employees are qualified for requested positions and work shifts, invites them to use their manager’s preferred system and then makes sure their total work hours comply with the businesses staff management policy.

Designed by a seasoned team of HR Tech entrepreneurs
Voilà! keeps pushing the boundaries of staff management technologies and empowers managers to stay in control of their business most efficiently.

---

• The conversation list correctly shows the last message when it is an attached file.
• When creating a replacement request a manager can maintain to choose whether the replacement should be approved when he expresses his interest.
• Other minor fixes.

title: Voilà! – Manage Work Teams, Schedules & Calendars

container.value:
Flash Romeo Inc.
535-5600 Boulevard des Galeries
Québec G2K 2H6

creator: Flash Romeo Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Voilà! sets employee scheduling on autopilot. It’s time for managers to stop wasting time scheduling and managing employee replacements. Empower employees to take the wheel. With Voilà!, managers set their custom scheduling rules and assign work shifts to employees who create optimal schedules that meet everyone’s needs. Let time be on everyone’s side by assigning shifts and replacing workers on cruise-control.

The Employee-centric HR Solution



With Voilà!, employees are in the driver’s seat. They get to create their work schedule based on their managers’ needs for each position. Since employees know their availability best, they can make their schedule by bidding on available shifts, request replacements and swap work shifts with colleagues. Managers set their custom business rules and approve shifts based on their level of flexibility set in place.

👩‍💼👨‍💼 Why Managers Love It ❤️
✓ Define your staffing needs and create the required work shifts.
✓ Stop wasting time by creating recurring work shifts.
✓ Stay in control using advanced metrics and simple employee scheduling dashboards.
✓ Gain precious time back by letting employees fill in work shifts based on their availability.
✓ Prioritize which employees get to pick work shifts first using 100% customizable business rules scores and seniority.
✓ Fill open work shifts faster by alerting employees through email, SMS or push notifications.
✓ Set your custom rules and decide what you need to approve.

👩‍🏭👨‍⚕️👷‍♂️👩‍⚕️ Why Employees Love It ❤️
✓ Create a work schedule that fits your needs and constraints.
✓ View and manage your work shift calendar from anywhere on any device.
✓ Get notified about new work opportunities in the way you want: via email, SMS or push notifications.
✓ Whenever unavailable, request replacements on the go.
✓ Swap work shifts with coworkers.
✓ Request your vacations online for faster approval.
✓ Message coworkers from Voilà! via email, push notifications or SMS.

What makes it work so well?
Voilà! manages which employees are qualified for requested positions and work shifts, invites them to use their manager’s preferred system and then makes sure their total work hours comply with the businesses staff management policy.

Designed by a seasoned team of HR Tech entrepreneurs
Voilà! keeps pushing the boundaries of staff management technologies and empowers managers to stay in control of their business most efficiently.

---

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
Providing an excellent employee experience is essential. We focused on improving the employee experience with a visual overhaul of the dashboard and time clock.
Other improvements:
Employee timesheets are now available on mobile
Leave requests approved on mobile set all impacted shifts as replacements
Action shortcuts added directly in a shift’s details card
Simplified punch validation questionnaire and ability to punch even if the employee’s geolocation settings are off.

Voilà! sets employee scheduling on autopilot. It’s time for managers to stop wasting time scheduling and managing employee replacements. Empower employees to take the wheel. With Voilà!, managers set their custom scheduling rules and assign work shifts to employees who create optimal schedules that meet everyone’s needs. Let time be on everyone’s side by assigning shifts and replacing workers on cruise-control.

The Employee-centric HR Solution



With Voilà!, employees are in the driver’s seat. They get to create their work schedule based on their managers’ needs for each position. Since employees know their availability best, they can make their schedule by bidding on available shifts, request replacements and swap work shifts with colleagues. Managers set their custom business rules and approve shifts based on their level of flexibility set in place.

👩‍💼👨‍💼 Why Managers Love It ❤️
✓ Define your staffing needs and create the required work shifts.
✓ Stop wasting time by creating recurring work shifts.
✓ Stay in control using advanced metrics and simple employee scheduling dashboards.
✓ Gain precious time back by letting employees fill in work shifts based on their availability.
✓ Prioritize which employees get to pick work shifts first using 100% customizable business rules scores and seniority.
✓ Fill open work shifts faster by alerting employees through email, SMS or push notifications.
✓ Set your custom rules and decide what you need to approve.

👩‍🏭👨‍⚕️👷‍♂️👩‍⚕️ Why Employees Love It ❤️
✓ Create a work schedule that fits your needs and constraints.
✓ View and manage your work shift calendar from anywhere on any device.
✓ Get notified about new work opportunities in the way you want: via email, SMS or push notifications.
✓ Whenever unavailable, request replacements on the go.
✓ Swap work shifts with coworkers.
✓ Request your vacations online for faster approval.
✓ Message coworkers from Voilà! via email, push notifications or SMS.

What makes it work so well?
Voilà! manages which employees are qualified for requested positions and work shifts, invites them to use their manager’s preferred system and then makes sure their total work hours comply with the businesses staff management policy.

Designed by a seasoned team of HR Tech entrepreneurs
Voilà! keeps pushing the boundaries of staff management technologies and empowers managers to stay in control of their business most efficiently.

---
Are you an HR Manager?
Join Voilà! today and stop struggling with employee scheduling and start growing your business. Contact us! https://voila.app/en/contact-us/ or info@voila.app

Flash Romeo Inc.
535-5600 Boulevard des Galeries
Québec G2K 2H6

creator: Flash Romeo Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Voilà! sets employee scheduling on autopilot. It’s time for managers to stop wasting time scheduling and managing employee replacements. Empower employees to take the wheel. With Voilà!, managers set their custom scheduling rules and assign work shifts to employees who create optimal schedules that meet everyone’s needs. Let time be on everyone’s side by assigning shifts and replacing workers on cruise-control.

The Employee-centric HR Solution



With Voilà!, employees are in the driver’s seat. They get to create their work schedule based on their managers’ needs for each position. Since employees know their availability best, they can make their schedule by bidding on available shifts, request replacements and swap work shifts with colleagues. Managers set their custom business rules and approve shifts based on their level of flexibility set in place.

👩‍💼👨‍💼 Why Managers Love It ❤️
✓ Define your staffing needs and create the required work shifts.
✓ Stop wasting time by creating recurring work shifts.
✓ Stay in control using advanced metrics and simple employee scheduling dashboards.
✓ Gain precious time back by letting employees fill in work shifts based on their availability.
✓ Prioritize which employees get to pick work shifts first using 100% customizable business rules scores and seniority.
✓ Fill open work shifts faster by alerting employees through email, SMS or push notifications.
✓ Set your custom rules and decide what you need to approve.

👩‍🏭👨‍⚕️👷‍♂️👩‍⚕️ Why Employees Love It ❤️
✓ Create a work schedule that fits your needs and constraints.
✓ View and manage your work shift calendar from anywhere on any device.
✓ Get notified about new work opportunities in the way you want: via email, SMS or push notifications.
✓ Whenever unavailable, request replacements on the go.
✓ Swap work shifts with coworkers.
✓ Request your vacations online for faster approval.
✓ Message coworkers from Voilà! via email, push notifications or SMS.

What makes it work so well?
Voilà! manages which employees are qualified for requested positions and work shifts, invites them to use their manager’s preferred system and then makes sure their total work hours comply with the businesses staff management policy.

Designed by a seasoned team of HR Tech entrepreneurs
Voilà! keeps pushing the boundaries of staff management technologies and empowers managers to stay in control of their business most efficiently.

---
Are you an HR Manager?
Join Voilà! today and stop struggling with employee scheduling and start growing your business. Contact us! https://voila.app/en/contact-us/ or info@voila.app

Follow us on Social
Follow us on LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/voila-technologies/
See our latest pictures: https://www.instagram.com/voila.app/
Like our Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/voilatechnologies

Feedback
Share your thoughts! Let us know ways we can improve the app. Our mission is all about providing you with the best employee scheduling experience. Email us at info@voila.app

title: Voilà! - Employee Scheduling

container.value:
Flash Romeo Inc.
535-5600 Boulevard des Galeries
Québec G2K 2H6

creator: Flash Romeo Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Voilà! sets employee scheduling on autopilot. It’s time for managers to stop wasting time scheduling and managing employee replacements. Empower employees to take the wheel. With Voilà!, managers set their custom scheduling rules and assign work shifts to employees who create optimal schedules that meet everyone’s needs. Let time be on everyone’s side by assigning shifts and replacing workers on cruise-control.

The Employee-centric HR Solution



With Voilà!, employees are in the driver’s seat. They get to create their work schedule based on their managers’ needs for each position. Since employees know their availability best, they can make their schedule by bidding on available shifts, request replacements and swap work shifts with colleagues. Managers set their custom business rules and approve shifts based on their level of flexibility set in place.

👩‍💼👨‍💼 Why Managers Love It ❤️
✓ Define your staffing needs and create the required work shifts.
✓ Stop wasting time by creating recurring work shifts.
✓ Stay in control using advanced metrics and simple employee scheduling dashboards.
✓ Gain precious time back by letting employees fill in work shifts based on their availability.
✓ Prioritize which employees get to pick work shifts first using 100% customizable business rules scores and seniority.
✓ Fill open work shifts faster by alerting employees through email, SMS or push notifications.
✓ Set your custom rules and decide what you need to approve.

👩‍🏭👨‍⚕️👷‍♂️👩‍⚕️ Why Employees Love It ❤️
✓ Create a work schedule that fits your needs and constraints.
✓ View and manage your work shift calendar from anywhere on any device.
✓ Get notified about new work opportunities in the way you want: via email, SMS or push notifications.
✓ Whenever unavailable, request replacements on the go.
✓ Swap work shifts with coworkers.
✓ Request your vacations online for faster approval.
✓ Message coworkers from Voilà! via email, push notifications or SMS.

What makes it work so well?
Voilà! manages which employees are qualified for requested positions and work shifts, invites them to use their manager’s preferred system and then makes sure their total work hours comply with the businesses staff management policy.

Designed by a seasoned team of HR Tech entrepreneurs
Voilà! keeps pushing the boundaries of staff management technologies and empowers managers to stay in control of their business most efficiently.

---
Are you an HR Manager?
Join Voilà! today and stop struggling with employee scheduling and start growing your business. Contact us! https://voila.app/en/contact-us/ or info@voila.app

Follow us on Social
Follow us on LinkedIn: https://www.linkedin.com/company/voila-technologies/
See our latest pictures: https://www.instagram.com/voila.app/
Like our Facebook page: https://www.facebook.com/voilatechnologies

Feedback
Share your thoughts! Let us know ways we can improve the app. Our mission is all about providing you with the best employee scheduling experience. Email us at info@voila.app

535-5600 Boulevard des Galeries
Québec G2K 2H6

creator: Flash Romeo Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Evolia sets employee scheduling on autopilot. It's time for managers to stop wasting time scheduling and managing employee replacements. Empower employees to take the wheel. With Evolia, managers set their custom scheduling rules and assign work shifts to employees who create optimal schedules that meet everyone's needs. Let time be on everyone's side by assigning shifts and replacing workers on cruise-control.

The Employee-centric HR Solution



With Evolia, employees are in the driver's seat. They get to create their work schedule based on their managers' needs for each position. Since employees know their availability best, they can make their schedule by bidding on available shifts, request replacements and swap work shifts with colleagues. Managers set their custom business rules and approve shifts based on their level of flexibility set in place.

👩‍💼👨‍💼 Why Managers Love It ❤️
✓ Define your staffing needs and create the required work shifts.
✓ Stop wasting time by creating recurring work shifts.
✓ Stay in control using advanced metrics and simple employee scheduling dashboards.
✓ Gain precious time back by letting employees fill in work shifts based on their availability.
✓ Prioritize which employees get to pick work shifts first using 100% customizable business rules scores and seniority.
✓ Fill open work shifts faster by alerting employees through email, SMS or push notifications.
✓ Set your custom rules and decide what you need to approve.

👩‍🏭👨‍⚕️👷‍♂️👩‍⚕️ Why Employees Love It ❤️
✓ Create a work schedule that fits your needs and constraints.
✓ View and manage your work shift calendar from anywhere on any device.
✓ Get notified about new work opportunities in the way you want: via email, SMS or push notifications.
✓ Whenever unavailable, request replacements on the go.
✓ Swap work shifts with coworkers.
✓ Request your vacations online for faster approval.
✓ Message coworkers from Evolia via email, push notifications or SMS.

What makes it work so well?
Evolia manages which employees are qualified for requested positions and work shifts, invites them to use their manager's preferred system and then makes sure their total work hours comply with the businesses staff management policy.

Designed by a seasoned team of HR Tech entrepreneurs
Evolia keeps pushing the boundaries of staff management technologies and empowers managers to stay in control of their business most efficiently.

---
Are you an HR Manager?
Join Evolia today and stop struggling with employee scheduling and start growing your business. Contact us! https://evolia.com/en/contact-us/ or info@evolia.com

Feedback
Share your thoughts! Let us know ways we can improve the app. Our mission is all about providing you with the best employee scheduling experience. Email us at info@evolia.com
descriptionShort: Plan. Work. Together.

title: Evolia - Employee Scheduling

container.value:
Flash Romeo Inc.
535-5600 Boulevard des Galeries
Québec G2K 2H6

creator: Flash Romeo Inc.
descriptionHtml:
Evolia sets employee scheduling on autopilot. It's time for managers to stop wasting time scheduling and managing employee replacements. Empower employees to take the wheel. With Evolia, managers set their custom scheduling rules and assign work shifts to employees who create optimal schedules that meet everyone's needs. Let time be on everyone's side by assigning shifts and replacing workers on cruise-control.

The Employee-centric HR Solution



With Evolia, employees are in the driver's seat. They get to create their work schedule based on their managers' needs for each position. Since employees know their availability best, they can make their schedule by bidding on available shifts, request replacements and swap work shifts with colleagues. Managers set their custom business rules and approve shifts based on their level of flexibility set in place.

👩‍💼👨‍💼 Why Managers Love It ❤️
✓ Define your staffing needs and create the required work shifts.
✓ Stop wasting time by creating recurring work shifts.
✓ Stay in control using advanced metrics and simple employee scheduling dashboards.
✓ Gain precious time back by letting employees fill in work shifts based on their availability.
✓ Prioritize which employees get to pick work shifts first using 100% customizable business rules scores and seniority.
✓ Fill open work shifts faster by alerting employees through email, SMS or push notifications.
✓ Set your custom rules and decide what you need to approve.

👩‍🏭👨‍⚕️👷‍♂️👩‍⚕️ Why Employees Love It ❤️
✓ Create a work schedule that fits your needs and constraints.
✓ View and manage your work shift calendar from anywhere on any device.
✓ Get notified about new work opportunities in the way you want: via email, SMS or push notifications.
✓ Whenever unavailable, request replacements on the go.
✓ Swap work shifts with coworkers.
✓ Request your vacations online for faster approval.
✓ Message coworkers from Evolia via email, push notifications or SMS.

What makes it work so well?
Evolia manages which employees are qualified for requested positions and work shifts, invites them to use their manager's preferred system and then makes sure their total work hours comply with the businesses staff management policy.

Designed by a seasoned team of HR Tech entrepreneurs
Evolia keeps pushing the boundaries of staff management technologies and empowers managers to stay in control of their business most efficiently.

---
Are you an HR Manager?
Join Evolia today and stop struggling with employee scheduling and start growing your business. Contact us! https://evolia.com/en/contact-us/ or info@evolia.com

Feedback
Share your thoughts! Let us know ways we can improve the app. Our mission is all about providing you with the best employee scheduling experience. Email us at info@evolia.com

descriptionHtml:
Evolia sets employee scheduling on autopilot. It's time for managers to stop wasting time scheduling and managing employee replacements. Empower employees to take the wheel. With Evolia, managers set their custom scheduling rules and assign work shifts to employees who create optimal schedules that meet everyone's needs. Let time be on everyone's side by assigning shifts and replacing workers on cruise-control.

The Employee-centric HR Solution



With Evolia, employees are in the driver's seat. They get to create their work schedule based on their managers' needs for each position. Since employees know their availability best, they can make their schedule by bidding on available shifts, request replacements and swap work shifts with colleagues. Managers set their custom business rules and approve shifts based on their level of flexibility set in place.
